description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget screen for managers to view an overview of orders within an app. It includes UI components such as headers, notes, and an unauthorized placeholder, and accesses theme, permissions, and routing information.

classes.name: ManagerOrdersOverviewScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays an overview screen for manager orders, including access control based on user roles.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the stylized header section with a title, icon, and color.

classes.name: _Note
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays informational notes with an icon and styled container.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI depending on user authorization, displaying headers, notes, or an unauthorized placeholder.
